content: Threaded rod Electrogalvanized threaded rod ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Standard fixings for support systems- - ### FEATURES:Features Class 1A thread Available in various sizes Applications Fixing and fastening Recommended for structural and mechanical assemblies Recommended for indoor environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Carbon steel - AISI 1008, A36 Environmental conditions: Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) Technical Data | Material composition | Carbon steel - AISI 1008, A36 | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) ### ITEMS- 257965 - Threaded rod zinc 1/2 x 6 12 pk - Package Size 12 pc - 309393 - Threaded rod black 1/2 x 10 12 pk - Package Size 12 pc - 309388 - Threaded rod zinc 1/2 x 10 12 pk - Package Size 12 pc - 257963 - Threaded rod zinc 1/4 x 6 50 pk - Package Size 50 pc - 309386 - Threaded rod zinc 1/4 x 10 50 pk - Package Size 50 pc - 309390 - Threaded rod zinc 3/4 x 10 5 pk - Package Size 5 pc - 257969 - Threaded rod black 3/8 x 6 25 pk - Package Size 25 pc - 257964 - Threaded rod zinc 3/8 x 6 25 pk - Package Size 25 pc - 309392 - Threaded rod black 3/8 x 10 25 pk - Package Size 25 pc - 309387 - Threaded rod zinc 3/8 x 10 25 pk - Package Size 25 pc - 309389 - Threaded rod zinc 5/8 x 10 8 pk - Package Size 8 pc
